intro.title: Rite of Discovery
intro.p1: You’ve arrived to help make sense of a few curious clues.
intro.p2: Take a breath, look carefully, and choose what feels right.

s1.title: S1 — Tag Reassembly
s1.prompt: Reassemble the name tag by rotating the three pieces into order 1‑2‑3.
s1.hint: Hint (Gentle Mode): Middle piece often belongs in the center—try 1‑2‑3.

s2.title: S2 — Note Letter‑Match
s2.prompt: Match the three letters that don’t belong. Toggle the mismatched letters.
s2.hint: Gentle Mode is on. Try toggling exactly three letters.

s3.title: S3 — Proof Moment
s3.prompt: Choose how you learn the truth.
s3.gentle: Gentle hint: Either choice works — try the one that feels right.

ep.title: Epilogue — Helper Badge
ep.done: Well done. You completed the MVP slice.
ep.ngpNote: Mentor Mini unlocks when Helper Badge is earned. (Placeholder)
ep.gentle: Gentle note: You can replay later and try the other route.

outro.title: Wrap — Rite of Discovery
outro.p1: Thanks for playing. Ready to explore a different path?
outro.toggleGentle: Toggle Gentle Mode for next run

intro2.title: Toymaker Escape
intro2.p1: In the Workshop, choose your path: align gears or tune a music box.
intro2.p2: Solve carefully to collect parts and earn a medal.

intro.title: E1 — Workshop
intro.prompt: Pick your path to open the plate:

gears.title: Workshop — Align Gears
gears.prompt: Rotate three dials to align the gears to 1‑3‑2.

music.title: Workshop — Tune Music Box
music.prompt: Set the three sliders to match the pattern 2‑5‑7.
music.hint: Gentle hint: try a low, a mid, and a higher note.

colors.hint: Gentle hint: pick Red, Blue, and Green.

shapes.prompt: Place the shapes into the correct bins (stub).

ep.title: Episode Complete — Key Fragment 1
ep.note: Tip: Replay with a different route to try for a higher medal.

outro.title: Wrap — Toymaker Escape
outro.p1: Great work. Want to try for a different medal or route?
outro.switchRoute: Start with the other Workshop route

intro.title: Systems Discovery
intro.p1: Today you’ll complete a simple loop, plan a route, and sort waste correctly.
intro.p2: Notice how each step connects to the next—small choices add up.

b1.title: B1 — Loop Puzzle (Kitchen→Compost→Soil→Herbs)
b1.prompt: Complete today’s loop in order. Select each step in sequence.
b1.hint: Gentle hint: Kitchen → Compost → Soil → Herbs.

b3.title: B3 — Waste Sorting
b3.prompt: Sort items correctly. Toggle ‘Hints’ for guidance.
b3.hintDetail: Banana → Compost; Bottle → Recycle; Paper → Paper.

wrap.title: Wrap — Systems Scout Badge
wrap.done: Core pack complete — Systems Scout badge awarded.

outro.title: Wrap — Systems Discovery
outro.p1: Nice work. Want to try a different plan or explore more?
